* Adjusted for Daylight Saving Time Link: /time/dst/ (64 places).

Wed = Wednesday, July 1, 2020 (68 places). Thu = Thursday, July 2, 2020 (123 places).

km = how many kilometers from Hofuf miles = how many miles from Hofuf nm = how many nautical miles from Hofuf

All numbers are air distances – as the crow flies/great circle distance.

UTC (GMT/Zulu)-time: Wednesday, July 1, 2020 at 21:35:10

UTC is Coordinated Universal Time Link: /time/aboututc.html , GMT is Greenwich Mean Time Link: /time/gmt-utc-time.html .Great Britain/United Kingdom is one hour ahead of UTC during summer. Link: /time/united-kingdom-bst.html
